actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 4216 (b) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a special rule for determining constructive sale price in the case of automotive parts.

summary.text: Provides a special rule for determining the constructive sale price of automotive parts for the purpose of the manufacturers tax under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 4216 (b) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a special rule for determining constructive sale price in the case of automotive parts.
